name: css responsive viewport for the iframe
format:
<style> /* bum2 css */
ui-card-panel#COVID_19_Overview_Colone01 {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}
#COVID_19_Overview_Colone01_cards {
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
#Tab_COVID_19_Overview .nr-dashboard-template {
    overflow: hidden;
    /* Calculated from the aspect ration of the content (in case of 16:9 it is 9/16= 0.5625) */
    padding-top: 56.25%;
    position: relative;
    opacity: 1;
    width: inherit !important;
    height: inherit !important;
}
#Tab_COVID_19_Overview .nr-dashboard-template iframe {
    border: 0;
    height: 100%;
    left: 0;
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    width: 100%;
}
/* inside the iframe */
iframe .explorationContainer .exploreCanvas.stylableVisualContainerHeader .visualContainer .vcBody {
    padding: 20px;
}
</style>

name: general css rules
format:
<style>
    body.nr-dashboard-theme {
        /*font-family: 'Segoe UI',wf_segoe-ui_normal,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;*/
    }
    .md-toolbar-tools > .md-button:first-child {
        margin-right: 10px;
        margin-left: 0;
    }
    .md-toolbar-tools div p {
        font-size: .8em;
    }
    md-sidenav md-list-item .md-list-item-inner > p {
        margin-right: 10px;
    }
    md-sidenav md-list-item.nr-menu-item-active {
        background-color: #eef;
    }
    section.ng-scope md-sidenav {
        position: relative;
        top: 0 !important;
    }
</style>
